content:
From ESIPfed.org Slack and felt relevant to share

Reiterating here for emphasis - because I know we can't all read every email. ESIP I want to hear from you...please email me directly susanshingledecker@esipfed.org with how ESIP can best support you, your colleagues and your work in this time of incredible disruption. We are known to be a place where "we get things done" We are YOUR professional home!

This is from their email sent yesterday detailed below if you subscribe and want to read email directly.
From ESIP Team <staff@esipfed.org>
To ESIP-Updateâ†’Slack-General
Subject ESIP Update: We're Here For You
Date Yesterday at 12:47 PM
